channel.title: [PI] Making a command that does a specific emote
channel.description: I want to make a command do a specific emote, I've tried but it didn't work out well. I couldn't find even where to start. :o I am using PI. 317 version. I am going to add one that does the super man emote and flying carpet, so if possible can you tell me how to make it where you can move and stay doing the emote? ALSO I need a command to stop your emote.

item.title: [PI] Making a command that does a specific emote
item.dc:creator: @Rickrolla Rickrolla
item.description:
@Rickrolla wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("emotenamehere")) { c.startAnimation(animation id here); } Im not sure in this and idk how to stop...

It stops automaticly, and the code is correct.

Read full topic

}
